title: GameStop Trading and Robinhood’s Fallout
itunes:title: GameStop Trading and Robinhood’s Fallout
description:
Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Annie Massa talks about Robinhood’s fallout sweeping markets. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, with a virus and vaccine update, as well as reaction to J&J news. Webull CEO Anthony Denier discusses individual investor trading in names like GameStop. And we Drive to the Close with Tom Plumb, Chief Investment Officer at Plumb Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
